trans-unit.source: The steps in this document use the Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: The steps in this document use the Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft recommends using the Azure preview portal when creating new services.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft recommends using the Azure preview portal when creating new services.
